programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKWhistle.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifrq = p4 kv1 line p5, p3, p6 ;Blowing Frequency Modulation kv3 = p7 ;Fipple Modulation Frequency
asig STKWhistle cpspch(p4), 1, 4, 20, 11, kv3, 1, 100, 2, kv1, 128, 127 asig = asig*.7 ;too loud outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 .5 9.00 100 30 30 i 1 1 3 9.00 100 0 20 i 1 4.5 . 9.00 1 0 100 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
